localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
blogPost.body: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
blogPost.title: Probe - Calculate your SaaS metrics with one click in Google Sheets
blogPost.author: Aliaksei Kulbei

localize.description: 该应用程序根据您在Google Sheet中的订阅数据计算出知名的SaaS指标。以可识别的格式准备数据。包括订阅的客户ID、开始日期、结束日期和月值。一旦准备就绪，您就可以根据它计算与SaaS相关的订阅量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中单击一下即可计算您的SaaS指标

localize.description: 該應用程序根據您在Google Sheet中的訂閱數據計算出知名的SaaS指標。以可識別的格式準備數據。包括訂閱的客戶ID、開始日期、結束日期和月值。一旦準備就緒，您就可以根據它計算與SaaS相關的訂閱量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中單擊一下即可計算您的SaaS指標

previous.excerpt: A/B Testing and Feature Management across your React Native apps is here. Give your team the flexibility to run experiments and roll-out new features with the Taplytics React Native SDK.
previous.title: Taplytics React Native A/B Testing - A/B Testing and Feature Management for your React Native app

localize.description: 在您的React Native应用中进行A/B测试和功能管理。通过Taplytics React Native SDK，让您的团队可以灵活地进行实验和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 为您的React Native应用进行A/B测试和功能管理。

localize.description: 在您的React Native應用中進行A/B測試和功能管理。通過Taplytics React Native SDK，讓您的團隊可以靈活地進行實驗和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 爲您的React Native應用進行A/B測試和功能管理。

next.excerpt: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
next.title: Send a Mixtape - Give a digital playlist on a paper crafted cassette

localize.description: 播放列表来来去去，但mixtape是永远的。粘贴你的播放列表URL，它将自动添加到纸质mixtape模板。下载，打印，折叠，并分发一些怀旧。
localize.tagline: 在纸制卡带上赠送一个数字播放列表。

localize.description: 播放列表來來去去，但mixtape是永遠的。粘貼你的播放列表URL，它將自動添加到紙質mixtape模板。下載，打印，摺疊，並分發一些懷舊。
localize.tagline: 在紙製卡帶上贈送一個數字播放列表。
